Uses of Class
com.vmware.vcenter.ovf.DiskProvisioningType

  • Packages that use DiskProvisioningType 
    Package Description
    com.vmware.vcenter.ovf
    The com.vmware.vcenter.ovf package provides services to capture and deploy Open Virtualization Format (OVF) packages to and from the content library.

    • Uses of DiskProvisioningType in com.vmware.vcenter.ovf

      Fields in com.vmware.vcenter.ovf declared as DiskProvisioningType 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static DiskProvisioningType DiskProvisioningType.eagerZeroedThick
      An eager zeroed thick provisioned virtual disk has all space allocated and wiped clean of any previous contents on the physical media at creation time.
      static DiskProvisioningType DiskProvisioningType.thick
      A thick provisioned virtual disk has all space allocated at creation time and the space is zeroed on demand as the space is used.
      static DiskProvisioningType DiskProvisioningType.thin
      A thin provisioned virtual disk has space allocated and zeroed on demand as the space is used.
      Methods in com.vmware.vcenter.ovf that return DiskProvisioningType 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DiskProvisioningType LibraryItemTypes.StorageGroupMapping.getProvisioning()
      Target provisioning type to use for the storage group.
      DiskProvisioningType LibraryItemTypes.ResourcePoolDeploymentSpec.getStorageProvisioning()
      Default storage provisioning type to use for all sections of type vmw:StorageSection in the OVF descriptor.
      static DiskProvisioningType DiskProvisioningType.valueOf(java.lang.String name)
      Returns the enumeration constant for the specified name.
      static DiskProvisioningType[] DiskProvisioningType.values()
      Retrieve all enumeration constants pre-defined by this enumeration class.

      Target provisioning type to use for the storage group.
